params._basketId: Basket ID (tokenID) in the BasketToken (NFT) contract
params._protocolId: Id of the protocol of which the allocation is queried

returns._0: int256 Number of derby tokens that are allocated towards this specific protocol

params._basketId: Basket ID (tokenID) in the BasketToken (NFT) contract.
Basket ID (tokenID) in the BasketToken (NFT) contract.

returns._0: int256 Number of derby tokens that are allocated towards protocols.

params._basketId: Basket ID (tokenID) in the BasketToken (NFT) contract.

params._protocolNum: Protocol number linked to an underlying vault e.g compound_usdc_01

mintNewBasket(uint32,uint256).details: The basket NFT is minted for a specific vault, starts with a zero allocation and the tokens are not locked here.

params._vaultNumber: Number of the vault. Same as in Router.

returns._0: basketId The basket Id the user has minted.

pushAllocationsToVault(uint32,uint256).details: Sends over an array where the index is the protocolId

params._chainId: Chain id of the vault where the allocations need to be sent

rebalanceBasket(uint256,int256[]).details: First calculates the rewards the basket has built up, then sets the new allocations and communicates the deltas to the vaultFinally it locks or unlocks tokens

params._basketId: Basket ID (tokenID) in the BasketToken (NFT) contract.
params._deltaAllocations: delta allocations set by the user of the basket. Allocations are scaled (so * 1E18).

redeemRewards(uint256).details: makes a (crosschain) call to the vault to make the actual transfer because the vault holds the funds.

params._basketId: Basket ID (tokenID) in the BasketToken (NFT) contract.

params._chainId: number of chain id set in chainIds array
params._latestProtocolId: latest protocol Id aka number of supported protocol vaults, starts at 0

params._factor: percentage of tokens that will be sold / burned

params._threshold: treshold in vaultCurrency e.g USDC, must be negative

params._rewardsReceived: bool to set if rewards are received

params._xProvider: new address of xProvider on this chain

params._rewards: Rewards per locked token per protocol (each protocol is an element in the array)

basketAllocationInProtocol(uint256,uint2.notice: function to see the allocation of a specific protocol by a basketId. Only the owner of the basket can view this

basketRedeemedRewards(uint256).notice: function to see the total reeemed rewards from the basket. Only the owner of the basket can view this.

basketTotalAllocatedTokens(uint256).notice: function to see the total number of allocated tokens. Only the owner of the basket can view this.

basketUnredeemedRewards(uint256).notice: function to see the total unredeemed rewards the basket has built up. Only the owner of the basket can view this.

getDeltaAllocationsProtocol(uint32,uint2.notice: Getter for the delta allocation in Protocol vault e.g compound_usdc_01

getDeltaAllocationsVault(uint32,uint256).notice: Getter for delta allocation in a particulair chainId

mintNewBasket(uint32,uint256).notice: Mints a new NFT with a Basket of allocations.

pushAllocationsToVault(uint32,uint256).notice: Game pushes deltaAllocations to vaultsTrigger to push delta allocations in protocols to cross chain vaults

redeemRewards(uint256).notice: redeem funds from basket in the game.

setLatestProtocolId(uint32,uint256,uint2.notice: Setter for latest protocol Id for given chainId.

setNegativeRewardThreshold(int256).notice: Setter for threshold at which user tokens will be sold / burned

setVaultAddress(uint256,uint32,address).notice: setter to link a chainId to a vault address for cross chain functions
